Hello World!

UI/UX, Motion Designer + Illustrator
Shannon believes that curiosity and creativity go hand-in-hand and approaches every situation with an open mind.

Today, Shannon is a recent UX intern and a third year student at Algonquin College studying graphic design. She has been a freelance artist for over ten years and is proficient in several mediums including acrylic, watercolour, charcoal, graphite, Adobe Illustrator, InDesign, After Effects and Photoshop. In recent years Shannon has learned to code with html, css, jekyll and javascript, she uses this to code her own websites.

Shannon is an avid gamer who is all about player-vs-environment gameplay. She is a passionate reader of comic books and is a solid Druid in D&D. Her dream is to find a design family where she can build fluid experiences, illustrate, and create solid projects with great people.

 email: shannonshawdesign@outlook.com
